itemDisplayName: Bulk copy using Azure Data Factory
description: This template creates a V2 data factory that copies data in bulk an Azure SQL database to an Azure SQL data warehouse.
summary: This sample demonstrates copying a number of tables from Azure SQL Database to Azure SQL Data Warehouse. You can apply the same pattern in other copy scenarios as well. For example, copying tables from SQL Server/Oracle to Azure SQL Database/Data Warehouse/Azure Blob, copying different paths from Blob to Azure SQL Database tables.
